messages.subject: unschooling documentaries (was: What we're reading)
messages.msgSnippet: Peter Kowalke s website says that his documentary is the second one ever to be made about homeschooling.  Can anyone tell me what the other one is? And, to
messages.messageBody:
Peter Kowalke's website says that his documentary is the second one ever to
be made about homeschooling. Can anyone tell me what the other one is?

And, to anyone who's seen them -- how much of their content portrays or
addresses unschooling specifically?


Cheers,
Regan

>>> Maybe all those young unschooled filmmakers will immortalize unschooling
>>> in that medium.
>>
>> It's already been done once. It's called Kiki's Delivery Service ;-)
>
> And Peter Kowalke has just released his Documentary? of unchooled teens.
> About $20. Order through his website.
>
> ~Kelly
